text: Allah hi hai jiss ney tumharay liye zami ko therney ki jagah aur aasman ko chat bana diya aur tumhari sooraten banaeen aur boht achi banaeen aur tumehn umdah umdah cheezen khaney ko ata farmaeen yehi Allah tumhara perwerdigar hai pus boht hi barkaton wala Allah hai saray jahaan ka perwerish kerney wala
